column4: AH, ok, well that explains a little bit.  I was more concerned with the underlying "engine" then with the looks per se'  I realize you can change how it looks.  Ok, well I'll have to give this some thought.
Does anyone know if its possible to still get the Sun Java 1.4.2 sdk?
one last question if you will... ext3 or ReiserFS or??
ext3 is more flexible, reiserfs has some features some folks like...
